it.polimi.ingsw.Model
 
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions used by it.polimi.ingsw.Model
    Class
    Description
    HandFullException
    Exception that is thrown when a draw is requested but the hand is full This situation should never happen
    isEmptyException
    Exception that is thrown when a draw is requested on an empty deck Exception will be handled by the controller, may cause EndGame()
    WrongPlayException
    Exception that is thrown if the play is not valid contains the information about the play
